column4: DOES ANYONE KNOW A SOLUTION TO WHY A CRUZER 2GB IS HANGING ON BIOS???? IT HAS SOMETHING TO DO WITH IT BEING DETECTED AS A HARD DRIVE INSTEAD OF A KEY
DOES ANYONE KNOW A SOLUTION TO WHY A CRUZER 2GB IS HANGING ON BIOS???? IT HAS SOMETHING TO DO WITH IT BEING DETECTED AS A HARD DRIVE INSTEAD OF A KEY
essentially there is no difference between a key and a hard drive, to your bios at least
